alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Edwards; Kerr; Kinney; Real; Uvalde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 8:17PM CDT until May 12 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Bandera County in south central Texas... West central Kerr County in south central Texas... Eastern Kinney County in south central Texas... Uvalde County in south central Texas... South central Edwards County in south central Texas... Real County in south central Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Rocksprings to near Camp Wood to near Blewett, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Uvalde, Brackettville, Leakey, Spofford, Vanderpool, Sabinal, Camp Wood, Laguna, Barksdale, Tuff, Concan, Vance, Uvalde Estates, Dabney, Cline, Anacacho, Reagan Wells, Utopia, Alamo Village and Knippa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across western Uvalde and central Kinney County. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bandera; Edwards; Kerr; Kinney; Real; Uvalde
